item.title: New orbital clue reveals how hot Jupiters really formed

item.title: Why consciousness exists at all
item.description: Consciousness evolved in stages, starting with basic survival responses like pain and alarm, then expanding into focused awareness and self-reflection...

item.title: AI found a way to stop a virus before it enters cells

item.title: Anxiety and insomnia linked to sharp drops in key immune cells

item.title: Hidden dimensions could explain where mass comes from
